thread.title: EQUITY ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Reminds Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Ulta Beauty, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: EQUITY ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Reminds Investors of an Investigation Involving Possible Securities Fraud Violations by the Board of Directors of Ulta Beauty, Inc.

organizations.name: board of directors of ulta beauty, inc

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Levi & Korsinsky announces it has commenced an investigation of Ulta Beauty, Inc. (NASDAQGS: ULTA) concerning possible violations of federal securities laws.
On February 9, 2018, it was reported that a consumer class action lawsuit had been filed against Ulta. The suit alleges that Ulta has secretly been repackaging returned cosmetics and re-shelving them alongside unblemished products to sell at full price. On February 23, 2018, CBS News published a story on the alleged restocking practice, citing a former employee who alleged that managers pressured store employees to clean and repackage returned cosmetics “to keep the dollar amount for damaged or returned goods down.” To obtain additional information, go to :
http://www.zlkdocs.com/ULTA-Info-Request-Form-6497
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@levikorsinsky.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972.
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, California, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm’s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities and shareholder lawsuits. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180305005762/en/
Levi & Korsinsky, LLP
